events.name: mark_or_reset
events.pointcut_raw: (call(* InputStream+.mark(..)) || call(* InputStream+.reset(..))) && ( target(FileInputStream) || target(PushbackInputStream) || target(ObjectInputStream) || target(PipedInputStream) || target(SequenceInputStream) )

raw_lines: RVMLogging.out.println(Level.CRITICAL, "FileInputStream, PushbackInputStream, ObjectInputStream, PipedInputStream and SequenceInputStream do not support mark() and reset().");
